arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ
footnotes: Hakiwaumizi kichwa na kuwaletea ghururi, wala kwa kukinywa hicho haiwapotei akili yao kidogo kidogo, yaani hakileweshi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
